title: MSI orbs not awarding correct skins.
body:
Guaranteed 975+ skin, grants a 750 skin.

also on another account granted a ****ing 450 skin. Didn't bother screenshotting because too ****ed off.

replies.body:
So I may be missing something, but I can't find anywhere it guarantees 975+.

I know the grab bags are one 1350+ and one 975-, but as far as I know the orbs are just random with an extra chance for a Gemstone/Mythic/esports drop right?

When you click on it it shows what it contains. a Guaranteed 975 shard, and a chance of hextech skin shard, gemstone and grab bag.... as of this morning it no longer displays guaranteed 975 shard.

Nice fix....

Sorry, it still does, I had the wrong thing selected, and I shared the wrong image..... So that's on me as well. Time to find the other one HAHAhA. Battle academia.
So all's good? If you've found a bug I'd like to dig deeper, but lord knows I misread the hextech stuff sometimes. It can be a bit of a mess.
